description.default: The Afib project gathers expert reviews of records of physiological signals to determine whether Atrial Fibrillation (AFib) or Atrial Flutter (AFlutter) arrhythmia are present. The annotated records will be useful in learning arrhythmia waveform features and build AFib detection methods.

The Afib project gathers expert reviews of records of physiological signals to determine whether Atrial Fibrillation (AFib) or Atrial Flutter (AFlutter) arrhythmia are present. The annotated records will be useful in learning arrhythmia waveform features and build AFib detection methods.
